revised_prompt: Create a banner advertisement with the dimensions of 1200x628 pixels for a fictional brand's Black Friday Sale. The design should be clean, modern and professional. The brand name is 'TechStore' and should be displayed in a large, bold, sans-serif font at the center or top of the banner. The main message is 'Up to 70% Off', written in medium size in the central area. This should be highly contrasting with the background and it shouldn't have any complex patterns behind the text. At a prominent position, preferably at the bottom, include a call-to-action button with the exact words 'Shop Now'. The layout needs to be simple and uncluttered, with high focus on the text. The color scheme should be vibrant, eye-catching and professional. The background must be clean or subtle, enhancing the text readability.
